backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor exposing a no-op health check query.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing PWA, service worker, and install-affordance related files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing many frontend game components, physics utilities, and UI elements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry with PWA metadata, manifest link, icons, and root element for the React app.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: Web app manifest defining PWA name, colors, icons, display mode, and categories.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing install, activate, cache management, and offline fetch strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component registering the service worker and rendering install affordance, orientation guard, and game screen.
frontend/src/game/effects/Explosion.tsx: Renders explosion effects with variants for hits, player, and bomb, using preset ember positions and layered animations.
frontend/src/game/effects/ObstacleSparks: Displays rotating spark effects around obstacles, with enhanced colors and glow for boss variants.
frontend/src/game/effects/SparkBurst.tsx: Creates a radial spark burst with variant-based intensity, colors, and an optional completion callback.
frontend/src/game/entities/Bullet.tsx: Shows a styled bullet with glow, gradient core, and trailing effect positioned and rotated in world space.
frontend/src/game/entities/Obstacle.tsx: Renders a scalable hexagonal obstacle with color variants and integrated spark effects, supporting boss visuals.
frontend/src/game/entities/PlayerJet.tsx: Renders the player jet with optional animated thruster effects and detailed SVG body, positioned and rotated in world space.
frontend/src/game/GameScreen.tsx: Main game loop managing state, player movement, bullets, obstacles, collisions, boss logic, and effects.
frontend/src/game/hooks/useJoystickSensi: Manages joystick sensitivity with clamping and localStorage persistence via a custom hook.
frontend/src/game/physics/bounds.ts: Provides functions for clamping positions, reflecting velocity at boundaries, and checking out-of-bounds or border contact.
frontend/src/game/physics/obstacleCollis: Handles elastic collision resolution between circular obstacles with overlap separation and velocity clamping.
frontend/src/game/physics/playerObstacle: Determines whether a player-obstacle collision qualifies as a full hit based on penetration depth.
frontend/src/game/physics/vectors.ts: Provides angle-to-vector conversion, pixel-to-percent velocity scaling, and directional position offset utilities.
frontend/src/game/Playfield.tsx: Playfield wrapper rendering border, corner accents, and grid overlay around game content.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameOverlay.tsx: Renders HUD, progress bars, controls, and game-state overlays for the playfield.
frontend/src/game/ui/OrientationGuard.ts: Detects portrait orientation, attempts landscape lock, and shows a rotate-device prompt when needed.
frontend/src/game/ui/ShootButton.tsx: Implements a pointer-aware shoot button that triggers fire start/end events.
frontend/src/game/ui/VirtualJoystick.tsx: Implements a touch joystick with deadzone, clamped movement, and reset behavior emitting direction and magnitude.
frontend/src/game/ui/zIndex.ts: Defines z-index constants for consistent UI layering across the game.
frontend/src/game/utils/joystickMovement: Transforms raw joystick input into normalized direction and curved speed factor with deadzone and sensitivity rules.
frontend/src/game/utils/levelTimer.ts: Provides level-duration calculation and simple time formatting utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating no backend queries are needed for the game.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for themes, game colors, and responsive compact UI behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pwa/InstallAffordance.tsx: UI component that displays an install prompt when the PWA becomes installable and not yet dismissed.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load, checks for updates, and handles activation events.
frontend/src/pwa/useInstallPrompt.ts: Hook that captures the browser’s beforeinstallprompt event and exposes methods to trigger and track PWA installation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors and utilities using CSS variables including game-specific color sets.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, PWA feature requirements, and existing and pending features.
